snippet: President Obama released a statement today arguing that the Federal Communications Commission should “reclassify” broadband Internet access as a telecommunications service, which would effectively give the federal government the authority to...
abstract: President Obama released a statement today arguing that the Federal Communications Commission should “reclassify” broadband Internet access as a telecommunications service, which would effectively give the federal government the authority to protect “net neutrality.”

headline.main: Obama Says Internet Service Should Be Treated as a Utility
